summary: This document contains various subscriber information and legal compliance communications from Cingular Wireless regarding subpoenas and requests for information related to individuals connected to the Epstein case. It includes details about several individuals' accounts and legal obligations to appear before the State Attorney in Palm Beach County.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the recipient of legal requests and subpoenas related to the investigation.

persons.context: Erin Shaw is listed as a subscriber with account details provided, indicating her connection to the investigation.

persons.context: Dawn Guterman is mentioned as a subscriber with account information relevant to the case.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued to Cingular Wireless for subscriber information related to the investigation.

keyFacts: The document includes multiple instances of subscriber information for individuals connected to the Epstein case.
Detective Joe Recarey is tasked with receiving legal requests related to the investigation.
Erin Shaw, Dawn Guterman, and Maureen Brennan are identified as subscribers with active accounts.
The document references a subpoena issued on May 12, 2006, for information from Cingular Wireless.
There are mentions of legal compliance and the necessity for individuals to appear before the State Attorney.
